3.5.1.name: wordpress/kerstner-foundation-footer
3.5.1.description:
One of the many free services the Kerstner Foundation offers is FREE Web Hosting for Nonprofits. If you’re a nonprofit that qualifies you get free web/email/database/backup hosting free of charge essentially indefinitely as long as you keep this plugin activated and your nonprofit doesn’t engage in anything unethical.

Currently the Kerstner Foundation hosts over 1500 nonprofits free of charge!

You can apply for free web hosting here.

Although the hosting is 100% free, you are on the same enterprise infrastructure that our hosting partner, Hosted Fusion, uses to host some of the largest companies on earth. All of their mu
